DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial test VC-01™ combination product implant subcutaneously subject Type 1 Diabetes maintain safely two year . It also test VC-01 effective treatment subject Type 1 Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety , Tolerability , Efficacy Study VC-01™ Combination Product Subjects With Type I Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Men woman ( nonpregnant nonchildbearing potential ) Diagnosis type 1 diabetes mellitus least 3 year Stable diabetic treatment Willingness use continuous glucose meter Acceptable candidate implantation Advanced complication associate diabetes Immunosuppressive therapy
